key.name: description
key.value: Admin user can update all static files with calling url of "domain/update-all-static-files/" in browser (Only work in desktop versions). This work recommended after plugin or theme updated.

key.name: successfully_update
key.value: All static files updated successfully. Please clear the browser cache.

key.name: update_static_files
key.value: click here to update static files

key.name: update_language_description
key.value: Also all languages values can be updated using button.
